addr.title: Address
addr.help: IPaddress:Port or :Port to bind server to

log_trace.title: Log Trace
log_trace.help: Enable trace logging of SOAP traffic

interface.title: Interface
interface.help: The interface to use for SSDP (repeat as necessary)

delete_excluded.title: Delete Excluded
delete_excluded.help: Delete files on dest excluded from sync

exclude_if_present.title: Exclude If Present
exclude_if_present.help: Exclude directories if filename is present

files_from.title: Files From
files_from.help: Read list of source-file names from file (use - to read from stdin)

files_from_raw.title: Files From Raw
files_from_raw.help: Read list of source-file names from file without any processing of lines (use - to read from stdin)

min_age.title: Min Age
min_age.help: Only transfer files older than this in s or suffix ms|s|m|h|d|w|M|y

max_age.title: Max Age
max_age.help: Only transfer files younger than this in s or suffix ms|s|m|h|d|w|M|y

min_size.title: Min Size
min_size.help: Only transfer files bigger than this in KiB or suffix B|K|M|G|T|P

max_size.title: Max Size
max_size.help: Only transfer files smaller than this in KiB or suffix B|K|M|G|T|P

hash_filter.title: Hash Filter
hash_filter.help: Partition filenames by hash k/n or randomly @/n

filter_from.title: Filter From
filter_from.help: Read file filtering patterns from a file (use - to read from stdin)

exclude_from.title: Exclude From
exclude_from.help: Read file exclude patterns from file (use - to read from stdin)

include_from.title: Include From
include_from.help: Read file include patterns from file (use - to read from stdin)

metadata_filter_from.title: Metadata Filter From
metadata_filter_from.help: Read metadata filtering patterns from a file (use - to read from stdin)

metadata_exclude_from.title: Metadata Exclude From
metadata_exclude_from.help: Read metadata exclude patterns from file (use - to read from stdin)

metadata_include_from.title: Metadata Include From
metadata_include_from.help: Read metadata include patterns from file (use - to read from stdin)

public_ip.title: Public IP
public_ip.help: Public IP address to advertise for passive connections

cert.title: Certificate
cert.help: TLS PEM key (concatenation of certificate and CA certificate)

client_ca.title: Client Ca
client_ca.help: Client certificate authority to verify clients with

baseurl.title: Baseurl
baseurl.help: Prefix for URLs - leave blank for root

min_tls_version.title: Min TLS Version
min_tls_version.help: Minimum TLS version that is acceptable

allow_origin.title: Allow Origin
allow_origin.help: Origin which cross-domain request (CORS) can be executed from

htpasswd.title: Htpasswd
htpasswd.help: A htpasswd file - if not provided no authentication is done

user_from_header.title: User From Header
user_from_header.help: User name from a defined HTTP header

log_file_max_size.title: Log File Max Size
log_file_max_size.help: Maximum size of the log file before it's rotated (eg "10M")

log_file_max_backups.title: Log File Max Backups
log_file_max_backups.help: Maximum number of old log files to retain.

log_file_max_age.title: Log File Max Age
log_file_max_age.help: Maximum duration to retain old log files (eg "7d")

log_file_compress.title: Log File Compress
log_file_compress.help: If set, compress rotated log files using gzip.

log_format.title: Log Format
log_format.help: Comma separated list of log format options

log_systemd.title: Log Systemd
log_systemd.help: Activate systemd integration for the logger

modify_window.title: Modify Window
modify_window.help: Max time diff to be considered the same

checkers.title: Checkers
checkers.help: Number of checkers to run in parallel

transfers.title: Transfers
transfers.help: Number of file transfers to run in parallel

checksum.title: Checksum
checksum.help: Check for changes with size & checksum (if available, or fallback to size only)

size_only.title: Size Only
size_only.help: Skip based on size only, not modtime or checksum

ignore_times.title: Ignore Times
ignore_times.help: Don't skip items that match size and time - transfer all unconditionally

ignore_existing.title: Ignore Existing
ignore_existing.help: Skip all files that exist on destination

ignore_errors.title: Ignore Errors
ignore_errors.help: Delete even if there are I/O errors

dry_run.title: Dry Run
dry_run.help: Do a trial run with no permanent changes

links.title: Links
links.help: Translate symlinks to/from regular files with a '.rclonelink' extension.

expect_continue_timeout.title: Expect Continue Timeout
expect_continue_timeout.help: Timeout when using expect / 100-continue in HTTP

no_check_certificate.title: No Check Certificate
no_check_certificate.help: Do not verify the server SSL certificate (insecure)

ask_password.title: Ask Password
ask_password.help: Allow prompt for password for encrypted configuration

password_command.title: Password Command
password_command.help: Command for supplying password for encrypted configuration

max_delete.title: Max Delete
max_delete.help: When synchronizing, limit the number of deletes

max_delete_size.title: Max Delete Size
max_delete_size.help: When synchronizing, limit the total size of deletes

track_renames.title: Track Renames
track_renames.help: When synchronizing, track file renames and do a server-side move if possible

track_renames_strategy.title: Track Renames Strategy
track_renames_strategy.help: Strategies to use when synchronizing using track-renames hash|modtime|leaf

retries.title: Retries
retries.help: Retry operations this many times if they fail

retries_sleep.title: Retries Sleep
retries_sleep.help: Interval between retrying operations if they fail, e.g. 500ms, 60s, 5m (0 to disable)

low_level_retries.title: Low Level Retries
low_level_retries.help: Number of low level retries to do

update.title: Update
update.help: Skip files that are newer on the destination

use_server_modtime.title: Use Server Modification Time
use_server_modtime.help: Use server modified time instead of object metadata

max_depth.title: Max Depth
max_depth.help: If set limits the recursion depth to this

ignore_size.title: Ignore Size
ignore_size.help: Ignore size when skipping use modtime or checksum

ignore_checksum.title: Ignore Checksum
ignore_checksum.help: Skip post copy check of checksums

fix_case.title: Fix Case
fix_case.help: Force rename of case insensitive dest to match source

no_traverse.title: No Traverse
no_traverse.help: Don't traverse destination file system on copy

check_first.title: Check First
check_first.help: Do all the checks before starting transfers

no_check_dest.title: No Check Destination
no_check_dest.help: Don't check the destination, copy regardless

no_unicode_normalization.title: No Unicode Normalization
no_unicode_normalization.help: Don't normalize unicode characters in filenames

no_update_modtime.title: No Update Modification Time
no_update_modtime.help: Don't update destination modtime if files identical

compare_dest.title: Compare Destination
compare_dest.help: Include additional server-side paths during comparison

copy_dest.title: Copy Destination
copy_dest.help: Implies --compare-dest but also copies files from paths into destination

backup_dir.title: Backup Dir
backup_dir.help: Make backups into hierarchy based in DIR

suffix.title: Suffix
suffix.help: Suffix to add to changed files

fast_list.title: Fast List
fast_list.help: Use recursive list if available; uses more memory but fewer transactions

list_cutoff.title: List Cutoff
list_cutoff.help: To save memory, sort directory listings on disk above this threshold

tpslimit.title: Tpslimit
tpslimit.help: Limit HTTP transactions per second to this

user_agent.title: User Agent
user_agent.help: Set the user-agent to a specified string

immutable.title: Immutable
immutable.help: Do not modify files, fail if existing files have been modified

auto_confirm.title: Auto Confirm
auto_confirm.help: If enabled, do not request console confirmation

stats_unit.title: Statistics Unit
stats_unit.help: Show data rate in stats as either 'bits' or 'bytes' per second

stats_file_name_length.title: Statistics File Name Length
stats_file_name_length.help: Max file name length in stats (0 for no limit)

stats_log_level.title: Statistics Log Level
stats_log_level.help: Log level to show --stats output DEBUG|INFO|NOTICE|ERROR

bwlimit.title: Bandwidth Limit
bwlimit.help: Bandwidth limit in KiB/s, or use suffix B|K|M|G|T|P or a full timetable

bwlimit_file.title: Bandwidth Limit File
bwlimit_file.help: Bandwidth limit per file in KiB/s, or use suffix B|K|M|G|T|P or a full timetable

buffer_size.title: Buffer Size
buffer_size.help: In memory buffer size when reading files for each --transfer

streaming_upload_cutoff.title: Streaming Upload Cutoff
streaming_upload_cutoff.help: Cutoff for switching to chunked upload if file size is unknown, upload starts after reaching cutoff or when file ends

dump.title: Dump
dump.help: List of items to dump from: headers, bodies, requests, responses, auth, filters, goroutines, openfiles, mapper

max_transfer.title: Max Transfer
max_transfer.help: Maximum size of data to transfer

max_duration.title: Max Duration
max_duration.help: Maximum duration rclone will transfer data for

cutoff_mode.title: Cutoff Mode
cutoff_mode.help: Mode to stop transfers when reaching the max transfer limit HARD|SOFT|CAUTIOUS

max_backlog.title: Max Backlog
max_backlog.help: Maximum number of objects in sync or check backlog

max_stats_groups.title: Max Statistics Groups
max_stats_groups.help: Maximum number of stats groups to keep in memory, on max oldest is discarded

stats_one_line.title: Statistics One Line
stats_one_line.help: Make the stats fit on one line

stats_one_line_date.title: Statistics One Line Date
stats_one_line_date.help: Enable --stats-one-line and add current date/time prefix

stats_one_line_date_format.title: Statistics One Line Date Format
stats_one_line_date_format.help: Enable --stats-one-line-date and use custom formatted date: Enclose date string in double quotes ("), see https://golang.org/pkg/time/#Time.Format

error_on_no_transfer.title: Error On No Transfer
error_on_no_transfer.help: Sets exit code 9 if no files are transferred, useful in scripts

progress_terminal_title.title: Progress Terminal Title
progress_terminal_title.help: Show progress on the terminal title (requires -P/--progress)

max_buffer_memory.title: Max Buffer Memory
max_buffer_memory.help: If set, don't allocate more than this amount of memory as buffers

ca_cert.title: CA Certificate
ca_cert.help: CA certificate used to verify servers

client_cert.title: Client Certificate
client_cert.help: Client SSL certificate (PEM) for mutual TLS auth

client_key.title: Client Key
client_key.help: Client SSL private key (PEM) for mutual TLS auth

client_pass.title: Client Password
client_pass.help: Password for client SSL private key (PEM) for mutual TLS auth (obscured)

multi_thread_cutoff.title: Multi Thread Cutoff
multi_thread_cutoff.help: Use multi-thread downloads for files above this size

multi_thread_streams.title: Multi Thread Streams
multi_thread_streams.help: Number of streams to use for multi-thread downloads

multi_thread_write_buffer_size.title: Multi Thread Write Buffer Size
multi_thread_write_buffer_size.help: In memory buffer size for writing when in multi-thread mode

multi_thread_chunk_size.title: Multi Thread Chunk Size
multi_thread_chunk_size.help: Chunk size for multi-thread downloads / uploads, if not set by filesystem

order_by.title: Order By
order_by.help: Instructions on how to order the transfers, e.g. 'size,descending'

refresh_times.title: Refresh Times
refresh_times.help: Refresh the modtime of remote files

no_console.title: No Console
no_console.help: Hide console window (supported on Windows only)

fs_cache_expire_duration.title: Fs Cache Expire Duration
fs_cache_expire_duration.help: Cache remotes for this long (0 to disable caching)

fs_cache_expire_interval.title: Fs Cache Expire Interval
fs_cache_expire_interval.help: Interval to check for expired remotes

disable_http2.title: Disable Http2
disable_http2.help: Disable HTTP/2 in the global transport

human_readable.title: Human Readable
human_readable.help: Print numbers in a human-readable format, sizes with suffix Ki|Mi|Gi|Ti|Pi

kv_lock_time.title: Kv Lock Time
kv_lock_time.help: Maximum time to keep key-value database locked by process

disable_http_keep_alives.title: Disable HTTP Keep Alives
disable_http_keep_alives.help: Disable HTTP keep-alives and use each connection once.

metadata.title: Metadata
metadata.help: If set, preserve metadata when copying objects

server_side_across_configs.title: Server Side Across Configs
server_side_across_configs.help: Allow server-side operations (e.g. copy) to work across different configs

color.title: Color
color.help: When to show colors (and other ANSI codes) AUTO|NEVER|ALWAYS

default_time.title: Default Time
default_time.help: Time to show if modtime is unknown for files and directories

inplace.title: Inplace
inplace.help: Download directly to destination file instead of atomic download to temp/rename

metadata_mapper.title: Metadata Mapper
metadata_mapper.help: Program to run to transforming metadata before upload

partial_suffix.title: Partial Suffix
partial_suffix.help: Add partial-suffix to temporary file name when --inplace is not used

max_connections.title: Max Connections
max_connections.help: Maximum number of simultaneous backend API connections, 0 for unlimited.

name_transform.title: Name Transform
name_transform.help: Transform paths during the copy process.

attr_timeout.title: Attr Timeout
attr_timeout.help: Time for which file/directory attributes are cached

fuse_flag.title: Fuse Flag
fuse_flag.help: Flags or arguments to be passed direct to libfuse/WinFsp (repeat if required)

daemon.title: Daemon
daemon.help: Run mount in background and exit parent process (as background output is suppressed, use --log-file with --log-format=pid,... to monitor) (not supported on Windows)

daemon_timeout.title: Daemon Timeout
daemon_timeout.help: Time limit for rclone to respond to kernel (not supported on Windows)

default_permissions.title: Default Permissions
default_permissions.help: Makes kernel enforce access control based on the file mode (not supported on Windows)

allow_non_empty.title: Allow Non Empty
allow_non_empty.help: Allow mounting over a non-empty directory (not supported on Windows)

allow_root.title: Allow Root
allow_root.help: Allow access to root user (not supported on Windows)

allow_other.title: Allow Other
allow_other.help: Allow access to other users (not supported on Windows)

async_read.title: Async Read
async_read.help: Use asynchronous reads (not supported on Windows)

max_read_ahead.title: Max Read Ahead
max_read_ahead.help: The number of bytes that can be prefetched for sequential reads (not supported on Windows)

write_back_cache.title: Write Back Cache
write_back_cache.help: Makes kernel buffer writes before sending them to rclone (without this, writethrough caching is used) (not supported on Windows)

devname.title: Devname
devname.help: Set the device name - default is remote:path

mount_case_insensitive.title: Mount Case Insensitive
mount_case_insensitive.help: Tell the OS the mount is case insensitive (true) or sensitive (false) regardless of the backend (auto)

direct_io.title: Direct Io
direct_io.help: Use Direct IO, disables caching of data

volname.title: Volname
volname.help: Set the volume name (supported on Windows and OSX only)

noappledouble.title: Noappledouble
noappledouble.help: Ignore Apple Double (._) and .DS_Store files (supported on OSX only)

noapplexattr.title: Noapplexattr
noapplexattr.help: Ignore all "com.apple.*" extended attributes (supported on OSX only)

network_mode.title: Network Mode
network_mode.help: Mount as remote network drive, instead of fixed disk drive (supported on Windows only)

daemon_wait.title: Daemon Wait
daemon_wait.help: Time to wait for ready mount from daemon (maximum time on Linux, constant sleep time on OSX/BSD) (not supported on Windows)

nfs_cache_type.title: NFS Cache Type
nfs_cache_type.help: Type of NFS handle cache to use

nfs_cache_dir.title: NFS Cache Dir
nfs_cache_dir.help: The directory the NFS handle cache will use if set

auth_proxy.title: Auth Proxy
auth_proxy.help: A program to use to create the backend from the auth

rc_files.title: Remote Control Files
rc_files.help: Path to local files to serve on the HTTP server

rc_serve.title: Remote Control Serve
rc_serve.help: Enable the serving of remote objects

rc_serve_no_modtime.title: Remote Control Serve No Modification Time
rc_serve_no_modtime.help: Don't read the modification time (can speed things up)

rc_no_auth.title: Remote Control No Auth
rc_no_auth.help: Don't require auth for certain methods

rc_web_gui_update.title: Remote Control Web GUI Update
rc_web_gui_update.help: Check and update to latest version of web gui

rc_web_gui_force_update.title: Remote Control Web GUI Force Update
rc_web_gui_force_update.help: Force update to latest version of web gui

rc_web_gui_no_open_browser.title: Remote Control Web GUI No Open Browser

rc_web_fetch_url.title: Remote Control Web Fetch URL
rc_web_fetch_url.help: URL to fetch the releases for webgui

rc_enable_metrics.title: Remote Control Enable Metrics
rc_enable_metrics.help: Enable the Prometheus metrics path at the remote control server

rc_job_expire_duration.title: Remote Control Job Expire Duration
rc_job_expire_duration.help: Expire finished async jobs older than this value

rc_job_expire_interval.title: Remote Control Job Expire Interval
rc_job_expire_interval.help: Interval to check for expired async jobs

metrics_addr.title: Metrics Address
metrics_addr.help: IPaddress:Port or :Port to bind server to

rc_addr.title: Remote Control Address
rc_addr.help: IPaddress:Port or :Port to bind server to

rc_cert.title: Remote Control Certificate
rc_cert.help: TLS PEM key (concatenation of certificate and CA certificate)

rc_client_ca.title: Remote Control Client Ca
rc_client_ca.help: Client certificate authority to verify clients with

rc_baseurl.title: Remote Control Baseurl
rc_baseurl.help: Prefix for URLs - leave blank for root

rc_min_tls_version.title: Remote Control Min TLS Version
rc_min_tls_version.help: Minimum TLS version that is acceptable

rc_allow_origin.title: Remote Control Allow Origin
rc_allow_origin.help: Origin which cross-domain request (CORS) can be executed from

rc_htpasswd.title: Remote Control Htpasswd
rc_htpasswd.help: A htpasswd file - if not provided no authentication is done

rc_user_from_header.title: Remote Control User From Header
rc_user_from_header.help: User name from a defined HTTP header

metrics_cert.title: Metrics Certificate
metrics_cert.help: TLS PEM key (concatenation of certificate and CA certificate)

metrics_client_ca.title: Metrics Client Ca
metrics_client_ca.help: Client certificate authority to verify clients with

metrics_baseurl.title: Metrics Baseurl
metrics_baseurl.help: Prefix for URLs - leave blank for root

metrics_min_tls_version.title: Metrics Min TLS Version
metrics_min_tls_version.help: Minimum TLS version that is acceptable

metrics_allow_origin.title: Metrics Allow Origin
metrics_allow_origin.help: Origin which cross-domain request (CORS) can be executed from

metrics_htpasswd.title: Metrics Htpasswd
metrics_htpasswd.help: A htpasswd file - if not provided no authentication is done

metrics_user_from_header.title: Metrics User From Header
metrics_user_from_header.help: User name from a defined HTTP header

stdio.title: Stdio
stdio.help: Run an sftp server on stdin/stdout

private_repos.title: Private Repos
private_repos.help: Users can only access their private repo

force_path_style.title: Force Path Style
force_path_style.help: If true use path style access if false use virtual hosted style

etag_hash.title: ETag Hash
etag_hash.help: Which hash to use for the ETag, or auto or blank for off

auth_key.title: Auth Key
auth_key.help: Set key pair for v4 authorization: access_key_id,secret_access_key

no_cleanup.title: No Cleanup
no_cleanup.help: Not to cleanup empty folder after object is deleted

no_auth.title: No Auth
no_auth.help: Allow connections with no authentication if set

no_modtime.title: No Modification Time
no_modtime.help: Don't read/write the modification time (can speed things up)

dir_cache_time.title: Dir Cache Time
dir_cache_time.help: Time to cache directory entries for

vfs_refresh.title: VFS Refresh
vfs_refresh.help: Refreshes the directory cache recursively in the background on start

poll_interval.title: Poll Interval
poll_interval.help: Time to wait between polling for changes, must be smaller than dir-cache-time and only on supported remotes (set 0 to disable)

vfs_links.title: VFS Links
vfs_links.help: Translate symlinks to/from regular files with a '.rclonelink' extension for the VFS

vfs_cache_poll_interval.title: VFS Cache Poll Interval
vfs_cache_poll_interval.help: Interval to poll the cache for stale objects

vfs_cache_max_age.title: VFS Cache Max Age
vfs_cache_max_age.help: Max time since last access of objects in the cache

vfs_cache_max_size.title: VFS Cache Max Size
vfs_cache_max_size.help: Max total size of objects in the cache

vfs_cache_min_free_space.title: VFS Cache Min Free Space
vfs_cache_min_free_space.help: Target minimum free space on the disk containing the cache

vfs_read_chunk_size.title: VFS Read Chunk Size
vfs_read_chunk_size.help: Read the source objects in chunks

vfs_read_chunk_size_limit.title: VFS Read Chunk Size Limit
vfs_read_chunk_size_limit.help: If greater than --vfs-read-chunk-size, double the chunk size after each chunk read, until the limit is reached ('off' is unlimited)

vfs_read_chunk_streams.title: VFS Read Chunk Streams
vfs_read_chunk_streams.help: The number of parallel streams to read at once

vfs_case_insensitive.title: VFS Case Insensitive
vfs_case_insensitive.help: If a file name not found, find a case insensitive match

vfs_block_norm_dupes.title: VFS Block Norm Dupes
vfs_block_norm_dupes.help: If duplicate filenames exist in the same directory (after normalization), log an error and hide the duplicates (may have a performance cost)

vfs_write_wait.title: VFS Write Wait
vfs_write_wait.help: Time to wait for in-sequence write before giving error

vfs_read_wait.title: VFS Read Wait
vfs_read_wait.help: Time to wait for in-sequence read before seeking

vfs_write_back.title: VFS Write Back
vfs_write_back.help: Time to writeback files after last use when using cache

vfs_read_ahead.title: VFS Read Ahead
vfs_read_ahead.help: Extra read ahead over --buffer-size when using cache-mode full

vfs_used_is_size.title: VFS Used Is Size
vfs_used_is_size.help: Use the `rclone size` algorithm for Used size

vfs_fast_fingerprint.title: VFS Fast Fingerprint
vfs_fast_fingerprint.help: Use fast (less accurate) fingerprints for change detection

vfs_disk_space_total_size.title: VFS Disk Space Total Size
vfs_disk_space_total_size.help: Specify the total space of disk

umask.title: Umask
umask.help: Override the permission bits set by the filesystem (not supported on Windows)

uid.title: Uid
uid.help: Override the uid field set by the filesystem (not supported on Windows)

gid.title: Gid
gid.help: Override the gid field set by the filesystem (not supported on Windows)

vfs_metadata_extension.title: VFS Metadata Extension
vfs_metadata_extension.help: Set the extension to read metadata from.

disable_dir_list.title: Disable Dir List
disable_dir_list.help: Disable HTML directory list on GET request for a directory
